text:

“It’s the number-one terrorism sponsor in the world,” Watters quickly responded as the student gave him a puzzled look. 
Another student was backed into a corner when asked which countries harbor terrorism. “America is a haven of terrorism,” she stated. 
It seems as if these protesters really don’t know what they’re talking about when it comes to the real issues. While they might know the general information about issues such as the temporary travel ban and the proposed wall between the U.S./Mexico border, they haven’t quite done their research as to why these things are happening. 
Perhaps they should go back to school so they can learn about the real threats to our freedom. 
But as it stands, they’re only proving Stein’s point.
